meanings.sent1: She wore the sluttiest dress to the party.
meanings.sent2: That outfit is the sluttiest one she owns.
meanings.sent3: Her choice of clothing for the event was definitely the sluttiest.
meanings.sent4: The neon pink dress was the sluttiest thing in the entire store.
meanings.sent5: The bright red lipstick was the sluttiest touch to her look.

meanings.definition: Most promiscuous or sexually provocative in behavior.
meanings.sent1: Out of all her friends, she was known as the sluttiest.
meanings.sent2: The gossip about her being the sluttiest girl in school spread quickly.
meanings.sent3: Her flirtatious behavior at the party was the sluttiest of them all.
meanings.sent4: The way she danced was the sluttiest move anyone had ever seen.
meanings.sent5: Her reputation as the sluttiest girl in town was hard to shake off.
